com.googlecode.salix.Salix
Class TreeItem

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      com.googlecode.salix.Salix.TreeItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasVisibility
public class TreeItem
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject

Tree item representing a tree node - replacement for default GWT tree item.

Author:
Peter Manka, Richard "Virgo" Richter

Constant Field Values

level

private int level
Holds the information about the level, on which this node is. -1 is for internal root, that is not counted in.

private com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget createConnectorPicture()

setState

public void setState(boolean expanded)
Sets expanded state of this node (false is collapsed). This method is provided for GWT TreeItem "compatibility". Calls expand/collapse methods accordingly.

Parameters:
expanded - node will be expanded if true

getState

public boolean getState()
Returns true if this tree item is expanded, otherwise returns false.

Returns:
true if tree item is expanded, false if collapsed

clearClickHandlers

public void clearClickHandlers()

remove

public void remove()
Removes this item from the tree. If the item was selected, parent will be selected. Internal tree root can not be removed (nothing happens).

removeItems

public void removeItems()
Removes all children from the item.

removeItem

public void removeItem(TreeItem item)

getWidget

content of this tree item

setComparator

public void setComparator(java.util.Comparator<TreeItem> itemComparator)
Sets comparator for children sorting and sorts children immediatelly.

Parameters:
itemComparator - comparator for children sorting

sortAndRedraw

public void sortAndRedraw()
Sorts children of this tree item and redraws the whole subtree. If no comparator is found for tree item or for tree (in config) then no sort or redraw is performed.

defaultSortOnly

private void defaultSortOnly()

sortChildren

public void sortChildren(java.util.Comparator<TreeItem> itemComparator)
Orders all children items according to specified comparator. This comparator is not set for the tree item - use setComparator(java.util.Comparator) for this. Subtree is redrawn. If null comparator is set, no sort is performed, but subtree will be redrawn.

Parameters:
itemComparator - tree item comparator

sortOnly

private void sortOnly(java.util.Comparator<TreeItem> itemComparator)

setSelected

public void setSelected(boolean selected)
Selects or deselects this item.

Parameters:
selected - true to select the item, false to deselect it

isSelected

public boolean isSelected()
Determines whether this item is currently selected.

Returns:
true if it is selected
